TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {4781=Hovanes Margarian Consumer Protection Attorney August 7, 2014 9:37am Relationship: Fellow lawyer in community, 10182=Licensed since 2000, 12638=  I was born in Port Arthur, Texas and raised in the Golden Triangle of Texas.  I completed my B.S. degree from Auburn University after only 2 1/2 years of study.  I began working as a police officer at 21 years old.  I was a college professor with two masters degrees at age 26.  By age 30, I was finishing law school.  I have since completed a third masters degree and defended over 2000 people who have been accused of crimes.  My experience as a defense lawyer includes over 100 jury trials., 6028=Robert Fickman Criminal Defense Attorney August 9, 2014 3:49am Relationship: Fellow lawyer in community, 2395=1208 Edwards Street Houston, TX, 77007, 17273=Posted by Kevin July 17, 2015 4:49pm, 15501=Posted by a client July 13, 2015 11:13am}
